Our Values

We believe in the power of the open web. We take on projects when we can add value.

  • People over profit

    We all need to make money, but not at the expense of our well-beeing.

  • Partners, not suppliers

    We see ourselves as a trusted partner. Your project becomes our project.

  • Share what you know

    The more we all share what we know, the better the world around us.

  • Question everything

    You'll never come to a smart answer without asking many questions.

  • Talk it through

    We believe conversations are the best tools to solve problems.
